channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: In Canada: Universal Music Canada’s Julie Adam Is Billboard Canada Women in Music’s 2025 Executive of the Year
item.description: 🇨🇦✨ Shining bright like a diamond in the Canadian music scene! Congrats to Julie Adam on her well-deserved achievement 🎶💪 #WomenInMusic #CanadianPride

item.title: Jackzebra Announces Hunched Jack Mixtape, Teams Up With James Ferraro and Glasear for New Song: Watch the Video
item.description: 🎶 Dive into a musical journey with Jackzebra's new mixtape! 🦓 Teaming up with James Ferraro and Glasear for a bop! 🎤 #NewMusicAlert #CollabGoals

item.title: Paul McCartney to Kick Off 2025 North American Tour
item.description: 🎸 Let's rock 'n' roll! Paul McCartney hitting the road in 2025 - who's snagging tickets? 🎶 #MusicNews #PaulMcCartneyTour

item.title: My Chemical Romance Map Out Massive 2026 “The Black Parade” Tour: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎶 Calling all emos! My Chemical Romance is hitting the road in 2026 with "The Black Parade" Tour! Who's snagging tickets? 🖤 #MCR #TheBlackParadeTour

item.title: Tame Impala – “Dracula”
item.description: Sink your teeth into Tame Impala's latest track "Dracula"! 🦇🎶 Turn up the volume and feel the vibes! #NewMusicAlert
